options.content: ${website}
SEO Web Vitals

item.filter: Response time for step "health check" of scenario "Web Health Check".
Response code for step "health check" of scenario "Web Health Check".

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

list.definition:
SELECT h.host
FROM hosts h
JOIN hosts_groups hg ON h.hostid = hg.hostid
JOIN hstgrp g ON hg.groupid = g.groupid
WHERE h.status = 0
  AND (
    g.name LIKE '%$application%'
    OR g.name = 'Websites'
  )
GROUP BY h.host
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
           WHEN g.name LIKE '%$application%' THEN g.groupid
           WHEN g.name = 'Websites' THEN g.groupid
         END) = 2;
list.label: website
list.name: website
list.query:
SELECT h.host
FROM hosts h
JOIN hosts_groups hg ON h.hostid = hg.hostid
JOIN hstgrp g ON hg.groupid = g.groupid
WHERE h.status = 0
  AND (
    g.name LIKE '%$application%'
    OR g.name = 'Websites'
  )
GROUP BY h.host
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
           WHEN g.name LIKE '%$application%' THEN g.groupid
           WHEN g.name = 'Websites' THEN g.groupid
         END) = 2;

list.definition: SELECT url FROM SYNTHETIC_MONITORING.WEBSITES WHERE name = "$website";
list.name: url
list.query: SELECT url FROM SYNTHETIC_MONITORING.WEBSITES WHERE name = "$website";

list.definition:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN '$website' = 'PSI Access' THEN 'https://app.psiaccess.com'
    WHEN '$website' = 'PSS Advantage' THEN 'https://App.pssadvantage.com'
 END AS link
